thread.section_title: FoxPaw Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FoxPaw | foxpaw.com
thread.title: BC

author: BC
title: BC
text:
I dropped my LG G5 Friday at work and broke the display in several places. I was pretty upset, especially for the fact that I'm leaving for a trip (out of country) for work on Sat the 18th.
Three coworkers suggested FoxPaw and after doing my research Saturday, I decided to do it.
I dropped my phone off Sunday (2/12/17) morning in a local kiosk and got it back later that day - like new.
The price was the same as my insurance on the phone, but I still have MY phone and done in a fraction of the time it would have taken through the insurance.
I posted my experience on FaceBook and have had many react to it and ask about FoxPaw now.
Thanks again!
